name: Harta
content:
Harta was an Ishi Tib male who was the father of Salju, a human female. When Salju was young, Harta brought her a pet therii named Elee. Harta would later recall an incident where the growing Elee knocked over an oil drum. As an adult, Salju became the proprietor of Black Spire Station in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu.
Harta first appeared in Star Wars: Datapad, a mobile game companion to the theme park Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. While his daughter Salju is described as human in the novel A Crash of Fate, Star Wars: Datapad and Elee & Me depict Harta as an Ishi Tib.
